channel.title: How can i make it were you don't have to do quests
channel.description: Hey guys i am back with another question.... How do i make it to were i don't need to do the quest to wield the item such as "MONKEY MADNESS"="Dragon Skim" <---- thats one of the items.. so if you could help that would be nice.

item.title: How can i make it were you don't have to do quests
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

Search the weapon’s item id and find what is causing the quest requirement needed to wield it.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make it were you don't have to do quests
